channel.title: SabiaScape -Shards-
channel.description:
[u][size=30pt][b]SabiaScape[/b][/size][/u]
[b] Well my other base failed :P. I was about to just quit so I decided to use shard's its stable and I fixed a bunch of stuff on it. I added some of my codes that were in my other base. I think I made the combat system way better than the old one in the winterlove base.[/b]
[size=20pt]What I have done so far[/size] -Updated combat system. Its not 20 times better than the old one. -Fixed up range, all bows have their own timers and Fixed magic shortbow spec. -Dialouges are added with player talking and npc. -The stable system is amazing. I have added my own connections system. -Better server.java thanks to Graham and Blake. -I have anti null, anti syi, nothing can basicly crash the server. -Npc's don't noclip made it way better than the old one. -Wildy levels fixed.
[size=20pt][b]Team[/b][/size] Yes im using a team this time.
[u]Client Coder[/u] -Open -Open
[u]Animation Coder[/u] -Open -Open
[size=21pt][b] Development[/b][/size]
[b]Combat[/b] -1v1 support system -Correct attacking timers such as the defense animations. -Wildy levels work perfect. -A level 100 cannot attack a level 50 in a level 3 wildy. -Edgeville is 1v1. -Special attacks work perfectly. -Combat following work nicely. -Facing in combat is perfect. -Multi combat works.
[b]Skills[/b] Red = Not Started Yellow = Started put not done Green = Done * Runecrafting * Agility * Herblore * Thieving o Tables o Chests o Npcs * Crafting * Fletching * Slayer * Mining * Smithing * Fishing * Cooking * Firemaking * Woodcutting * Farming will not be added as there is no point of it in this server.
[b]Quests[/b] -No need for quest as of right now.
[b]Pictures[/b] Coming Soon..
[b]Videos[/b] Youtube.com/sabiascape
=---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------=
[b]The Team[/b]
[code]Name -
Age -
E-Mail -
How long have you working with java -[/code]
Use that format to apply
My msn is SabiaScape@hotmail.com.
=---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------=

item.title: SabiaScape -Shards-
item.dc:creator: @Sabia Sabia
item.description:
@Sabia wrote:

                                                     [u][size=30pt][b]SabiaScape[/b][/size][/u]

Well my other base failed :P. I was about to just quit so I decided to use shard’s its stable and I fixed a bunch of stuff on it. I added some of my codes that were in my other base. I think I made the combat system way better than the old one in the winterlove base.

[size=20pt]What I have done so far[/size]
-Updated combat system. Its not 20 times better than the old one.
-Fixed up range, all bows have their own timers and Fixed magic shortbow spec.
-Dialouges are added with player talking and npc.
-The stable system is amazing. I have added my own connections system.
-Better server.java thanks to Graham and Blake.
-I have anti null, anti syi, nothing can basicly crash the server.
-Npc’s don’t noclip made it way better than the old one.
-Wildy levels fixed.

[size=20pt]Team[/size]
Yes im using a team this time.

Client Coder
-Open
-Open

Animation Coder
-Open
-Open

                                      [size=21pt][b] Development[/b][/size]

Combat
-1v1 support system
-Correct attacking timers such as the defense animations.
-Wildy levels work perfect.
-A level 100 cannot attack a level 50 in a level 3 wildy.
-Edgeville is 1v1.
-Special attacks work perfectly.
-Combat following work nicely.
-Facing in combat is perfect.
-Multi combat works.

Skills
Red = Not Started
Yellow = Started put not done
Green = Done

  • Runecrafting
  • Agility
  • Herblore
  • Thieving
    o Tables
    o Chests
    o Npcs
  • Crafting
  • Fletching
  • Slayer
  • Mining
  • Smithing
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
  • Firemaking
  • Woodcutting
  • Farming will not be added as there is no point of it in this server.

Quests
-No need for quest as of right now.

Pictures
Coming Soon…

Videos
Youtube.com/sabiascape

=---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------=

The Team

E-Mail -

How long have you working with java -[/code]

Use that format to apply

My msn is SabiaScape@hotmail.com.
